self_assessment.biggest_challenge: Implementing a harmonious color scheme that balances NexCell's burgundy brand color with status indicators while maintaining accessibility and visual hierarchy. Integrating the official NexCell hexagonal logo seamlessly into the application layout.
self_assessment.proudest_aspect: The comprehensive implementation of all required and optional features (pagination with configurable page sizes, custom date formatting, loading states, error handling, TanStack Query, animations, branded logo) while maintaining clean, production-ready code architecture. The design system using NexCell's brand colors creates a cohesive, professional look that feels uniquely branded rather than generic.
